medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The chilblains have been active over many years, with inflammation and pain exacerbating after cold exposure. Scaly and crusted ulcers from chilblains were constantly observed on both hands and feet. At the start of baricitinib treatment, the patient experienced active chilblains.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Subclinical hypothyroidism, basal ganglia calcifications, and mild intellectual disability.
